title: Condo Grade PRIVATE CHEF & BAR Wash Washington Park 5 min to Downtown
neighborhood: Downtown Wash Park Washington Park Cherry Creek Denver
posting_body: One bedroom One bathroom ready for move in September 2!
This property offers the best views, the best service and the best amenities, in the best location in Denver.
This luxurious property is ideally located blocks from Washington Park, five minutes to Cherry Creek and ten minutes from the heart of Downtown Denver.
Enjoy the serenity of high rise living and first class amenities, five minutes from everywhere you want to be.
Complimentary food offerings throughout the week
Well equipped with high end appliances, pizza oven, and ice maker
Full service bar with cocktail, beer, wine, and drink specials
Salt water pool with loungers & private cabanas
Iconic Rocky Mountain and Denver skyline vantages
ft fitness center with gorgeous views.
State of the art equipment including Peloton Bikes
Private training studio for individual sessions
Show off your strategic skill with a game of bocce ball
High speed Wi-Fi in common areas
24 hour fitness center with TRX equipment
State of the art destination access elevators
